Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grandson found such a nice {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/SpouseNoun}} }} }}.
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.
Entries.Thu: I can't talk right now, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderInformalNoun}} }} }}.#$e#My favorite program is on.
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old man to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderInformalNoun}} }} }}.

Changes.LogName: Fix George - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
